title: Vegetarian Lentil Soup
instructions: Rinse lentils and set aside.
In a large pot, sauté chopped onions, garlic, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add cumin, coriander, and bay leaves. Stir well.
Pour in vegetable broth and add rinsed lentils. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until lentils are tender, about 20-25 minutes.
Stir in diced tomatoes and continue to simmer for an additional 10 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Remove bay leaves before serving.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Reserve some pasta water.
In a pan, sauté minced garlic and red pepper flakes in olive oil until fragrant.
Add cooked spaghetti to the pan. Toss to coat, adding pasta water as needed for desired consistency.
Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with chopped parsley and Parmesan cheese.
Serve hot, drizzled with extra olive oil if desired.

title: Mango Lassi
instructions: Peel and dice ripe mangoes.
In a blender, combine mango chunks, yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom powder.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes and blend again until the lassi is chilled and frothy.
Pour into glasses and garnish with a sprinkle of cardamom powder.
Serve immediately and enjoy this refreshing mango lassi!

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella into 1/4-inch thick slices.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a serving platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve immediately for a simple and refreshing Caprese Salad!

title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon-Dill Sauce
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Grill salmon for about 4-5 minutes per side or until it easily flakes with a fork.
In a small bowl, mix together chopped dill and lemon juice to make the sauce.
Drizzle the lemon-dill sauce over the grilled salmon before serving.
Garnish with lemon wedges and fresh dill, and enjoy!
